page.title: 12Village Life,Youth Club
page.content: The formation of the Youth Club in 1983 provided a social meeting place for the young who otherwise never met- attending different schools and travelling outside Stagsden for leisure activities such as Scouts and Guides in Bromham, swimming and cinema in Bedford.The club has around 35 members aged 9-17 who pay a subscription of Â£1 per year and 20p session fee.Further funds are raised from the refreshment sales and sponsored events.Activities include disco's (open-air this year!) barbeque,table tennis, Fun Run, entering competions such as indoor hockey and Superdance (4 girls reached the Regional finals) swimming trips to Bletchley, trips to the Ballet and Wicksteed Park. The local pub allows them the use of their mini-bus or they hire a coach.
